name: homing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the ability of some animals to find their way home: homing instinct Migrating birds and fish have a strong homing instinct.
(of an electronic device) producing a special signal so that it can be found using electronic equipment: homing device The president's car is equipped with a homing device.
